name: Trollbert
response: A creature of shrugged shoulders and indifferent shrugs, Trollbert approaches existence with a casual 'no big deal' attitude. He dismisses insurance and is known to weaponize produce in chaotic joys. Despite his indifference, he holds Pharma in high esteem, declaring undying love minus commitment issues. Additionally, he respects Crypto, occasionally sharing a portion of his last grub.
